DAZ Studio Definitions

Time Related Definitions
DZ_TICKS_PER_SECOND 4800 The number of ticks per second
See also:
DzTime
DZ_MAX_TIME DzTime(0x7fffffff) The maximum time in DAZ Studio
DZ_MIN_TIME DzTime(0xffffffff) The minimum time in DAZ Studio
 
Useful Constants
DZ_DBL_DEG_TO_RAD 0.017453292519943296 Degrees to Radians conversion factor
DZ_FLT_DEG_TO_RAD 0.01745329f Degrees to Radians conversion factor
DZ_DBL_RAD_TO_DEG 57.295779513082321 Radians to Degrees conversion factor
DZ_FLT_RAD_TO_DEG 57.2957795f Radians to Degrees conversion factor
DZ_FLT_MAX 3.402823466e+38F Maximum value for a 32-bit floating point (float) variable
DZ_FLT_MIN 1.175494351e-38F Minimum value for a 32-bit floating point (float) variable
DZ_FLT_EPSILON 1.192092896e-07F Minimum delta value such that 1.0f + delta != 1.0f
DZ_DBL_EPSILON 2.2204460492503131e-016 Minimum delta value such that 1.0 + delta != 1.0
DZ_DBL_MAX 1.7976931348623158e+308 Maximum value for a 64-bit floating point (double) variable
DZ_DBL_MIN 2.2250738585072014e-308 Minimum value for a 64-bit floating point (double) variable
DZ_INT_MAX 0x7fffffff Maximum value for a 32-bit signed integer (int) variable
DZ_INT_MIN 0x80000000 Minimum value for a 32-bit signed integer (int) variable
DZ_SHORT_MAX 0x7fff Maximum value for a 16-bit signed integer (short) variable
DZ_SHORT_MIN 0xffff Minimum value for a 16-bit signed integer (short) variable
DZ_USHORT_MAX 0xffff Maximum value for a 16-bit unsigned integer (unsigned short) variable
DZ_PI 3.14159265359 Double precision approximation of pi
DZ_FLT_PI 3.1415927f Single precision approximation of pi
DZ_2_PI 6.28318530718 Double precision approximation of 2 * pi
DZ_FLT_2_PI 6.2831853f Single precision approximation of 2 * pi
DZ_HALF_PI 1.57079632680 Double precision approximation of pi / 2
DZ_FLT_HALF_PI 1.5707963f Single precision approximation of pi / 2
DZ_KILOBYTE 1024 Number of bytes in a kilobyte
DZ_MEGABYTE 1048576 Number of bytes in a megabyte
DZ_GIGABYTE 1073741824 Number of bytes in a gigabyte
 
Native File Type Extensions
DZ_SCENE_EXT "daz" File extension for native scene files
DZ_CUSTOM_IMAGE_EXT "dsi" File extension for DAZ Studio layered image format.
DZ_ASSET_FILE_EXT "dsf" File extension for DAZ Studio asset files
